== Main inclusion report for gtk-sharp2-unstable ==

# ''Availability:'' The package is available in ubuntu universe and builds on our three major platforms
# ''Rationale:'' The package is required for building several other applications intended to move to main (monodevelop, muine?)
# ''Security:'' No security issues reported
# ''Quality assurance:''  
** The package contains bindings and build-time executables, and documentation.  It requires no configuration or reading to benefit as an end user of gtk-sharp applications.
** Upstream has large mind share and corporate backing. Well supported.
# ''Standards compliance:'' FHS and Debian Policy met.
# ''Dependencies:'' Depends mainly on Gnome and Mono.  All in main.
